subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hideki Matsui, who had two home runs Tuesday night in a 16-3 victory, led the majors in home runs in July and raised his batting average to .293 from .270.
snippet: Hideki Matsui, who had two home runs Tuesday night in a 16-3 victory, led the majors in home runs in July and raised his batting average to .293 from .270.
